website_summaries.verdict: The Berghaus Explorer Active GTX was undeniably a lightweight and comfortable pair of hikers. These qualities received admiration that adds up to the good points of the shoe. It, however, failed to satisfy in terms of longevity and durability. Overall, if comfort is the user’s priority, the Berghaus Active GTX is a low-cut hiking shoe that can deliver. On the other hand, if the ability to last is the prime concern, it is reasonable to consider other options.
pros: Many hikers were thankful for the right-out-of-the-box comfort given by the Berghaus Explorer Active GTX
A majority of users applauded the waterproofing of this pair
It was very light, based on several consumer reviews
A significant number of owners enjoyed the glove-like fit of this day hiking shoe
According to a handful, the grip of the Berghaus Explorer Active GTX served them well on their hikes and walks
A reputable blogger praised the footwear’s amazing breathability
Its mesmerizing aesthetics impressed a couple of verified purchasers
cons: A couple of users were disgruntled with the build of the Explorer Active GTX
They noted that the upper separated from the sole after three months
They had it replaced, but they still experienced the same problem even after the third replacement
The laces snapped after a few weeks of moderate use, according to some upset wearers
Lots of shoe buyers found this shoe expensive

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!! They have been very lightweight but comfortable but obviously the standards that Berghaus apply to their ...
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers my shoes have started to fall apart within 6 months of very light use. They have been very lightweight but comfortable but obviously the standards that Berghaus apply to their other gear simply doesn't to these trainers. Give a wide birth. AWFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. I. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Sound like flip flops when walking
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 10 and based on other reviews it looked like a 10 would be the right choice for me. But I find them a little too big for me... even wearing thick socks they’re still slightly too big. Because of the size (or maybe it’s a design issue) they make the same kind of sound as flip flops do when you walk in them, I figure it’s because of the size and my foot is moving too much as I walk. I’m a big berghaus fan and own a lot of their clothes, but I’m not as impressed with their footware. Wouldn’t buy again...
customer_reviews.author: RichardT

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, not at all what you expect from berghaus, after 5 months very light use both had split along the sides and were letting water in, thankfully amazon replaced without question, so full marks to amazon but none for berghaus
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Berghaus unwaterproof walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have used berghaus gear for 30+ years and have generally been well satisfied. That is until now as these walking shoes were never really waterproof from the beginning and cracked and fell apart in the lower lace/toe area down to the sole within 5 months of purchasing. I feel that I should contact berghaus for some sort of refund but not sure of my customer rights. Will certainly stay well clear of berghaus footwear in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A Gerrard from Adlington

customer_reviews.title: Ok, in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Had them a long while, have lasted well, soles still very good. Find them a bit of a wide fit, never really took to them like other walking shoes, if that makes sense! But in there defence, they have looked after me and my feet. No complaint then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Berghaus do not know their sizes anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a repeat order for a size 9 boot, exact same boot and size. Tried on when they arrived and seemed snug but I thought they would stretch a little as was same size as previous. Wore on initial couple of short hikes and quickly became apparent that instead of stretching boots seemed to contract! Can barely wear them now for more than 10 mins without discomfort. Size 9 should be universal and not differ!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Always Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Berghaus products for these reasons.. Top Quality stiching Strong durable sole Very comfortable Waterproof Excelent for the terrains/purpose each design is made for 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: zooropa

customer_reviews.title: Great with free sound effects.
customer_reviews.text: Many hard miles walked and no signs of deterioration. I dont think these are a wide fit but they are a high fit resulting in a flip flop sound accompanied me on my travels. I used a sole insert to raise my foot and the flip flop has gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: BEST MENS ALL ROUND FOOTWEAR!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best all round footwear for men by far!!!! I am a retired soldier if 15yrs so take my word for it!! Not only are they fully waterproof! But a LIFE TIME GARENTEE!!! And because they are so lightweight they can be used for running also and to top it all off THEY LOOK AMAZING TOO 😉
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit straight out of the box and extremely comfortable. One note though, I take a UK 9, but from past experience ordered a UK 10 and was right to do so. Have been using Merrill footwear but quality was dropping off and these are much better made and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ! Utter rubbish , had first pair replaced after 6 months and the second pair has again split down the side after 5 months ! Now have the hassle of returning them yet again , only bought them as I thought they were the best. Do not touch with a barge pole
customer_reviews.author: alwenna joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and keep my feet dry would recommend
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Typical Berghaus quality! Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Berghaus walking boots with no problems! So I thought of buying Berghaus walking shoes for use in the summer months. I am so pleased with these shoes. I walked eleven miles in them first time with no problems through wet weather and feet staying dry! The size of shoe was correct for me moving up half a size extra than I normally take. I carry a packpack with me and wearing these shoes I felt stable with no stumbling. I found these shoes easy to keep clean after use. Typical Berghaus quality!
customer_reviews.author: michaelevans

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: As expected from a quality company. Works well, comfortable, and stylish (n my view). Purchased on a Black Friday deal so I got great value as well
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Percy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever had totaly comfortable dry and warm.this is my second pair wore the first ones out si had to buy another pair. Totaly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable, but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected for the price. The front of the shoe - black rubber, is peeling off after two days of indoor use! Do yourself a favour, buy a pair of Solomon X-Ultra shoes, or decent Haglofs.
customer_reviews.author: Dr P

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are a great waterproof walking shoe. Look neat Very comfortable. Laces just a little long but that's nothing.
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: maybe a bit to much to pay when there are ...
customer_reviews.text: maybe a bit to much to pay when there are so many other options on the market that do the same job and i have no grip in snow and ice.
customer_reviews.author: MR J J WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Positive Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Light, firm and a nice fit. But will need to go for a long walk to feel how my feet really feel.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lambe

customer_reviews.title: First Class Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy at a good price, I wear them four/five days a week and they still look as good as new. Extremely comfortable and supportive, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JG  Perthshire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Berghaus footwear, because it fits. With other makes I usually have to buy a size 10. This is great design and I love the colour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A repeat purchase having been completely satisfied with the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. MUTTON

customer_reviews.title: Poor lifespan for expensive shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable shoes but unfortunately they do not last more than 5 or 6 months. I've just had to return the second pair as they've started to fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition, good value for money, speedy delivery, would buy berghaus again. I'm a size 8 and they fitted as expected when new. Then they give a little, nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of everyday walking shoes I have ever owned. Light, airey and supportive these are designed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme F.

customer_reviews.title: Except product.
customer_reviews.text: These are 2nd pair I have bought in 2 years. They are an excellent product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Caton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size 9 fit shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size 9 fit shoe. I am a spot on size 9 foot as measured by Clarkes shoe store and these fit so well. Price is fantastic and they are fully waterproof and very very comfortable. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: mr m coole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Berghaus Footwear.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Fitted perfectly. Good design. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes got to test in the rain now pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: Bergy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Could do with another lace loop to be able to tighten them to feel more secure and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Tops
customer_reviews.text: Great desig, very comfy, very warm. Berghaus make great footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Mangham

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Walking Shoes...
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable, worn all weekend at 2016 Silverstone British Grand Prix, comfortable from minute 1. Like all Berghaus products, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Linda Tralau

customer_reviews.title: FOR NARROW FEET
customer_reviews.text: These a far to narrow, I have no problem with North Face
customer_reviews.author: Saintbull

customer_reviews.title: hich is what I need for a comfortable walk!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted; I have recently started buying Berghaus boots, following a recommendation from a relative, as they are a very slightly bigger fit, hich is what I need for a comfortable walk!
customer_reviews.author: steven morey

customer_reviews.title: Nice walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe at a good price really light you wouldn't know you had them on,
customer_reviews.author: i love tranmere rovers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. Bought these to replace my previous worn out Berghaus walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I have purchased. Most comfortable walking boots I have ever worn. Last pair lasted nearly two years before the uppers cracked and started to let in moisture.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence batchlor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable long lasting ...
customer_reviews.text: You need to go one size up for a good fit ..Very comfortable don’t sweat your feet ...great trainer
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Superb look, great fit (strangely a little ‘shallow’ - hence not five star)
customer_reviews.author: Grufty

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly + Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Fit snugly straight away - which is good as it's first outing was a 4 hour hike. Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Michael Westlake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable, durable, waterproof and looking good. Berghaus making the best trainers. I won't buy anything else..
customer_reviews.author: Calatheas

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Just like Bill's review these boots are falling apart after less than 4 months (no more than 200 miles of dog walking in gentle terrain) , the outer lining is cracked and coming away from the soles (they were never waterproof in wet grass either). For £100 I would have expected better, especially from Berghaus a company I have lots of outdoor gear from. I sent photos to Berghaus and they said I should return them to Amazon as the 30 day rule does not apply for faulty items. So I contacted Amazon and they agreed (with reluctance (shame on you Amazon)) to refund the cost. Maybe Bill and I were unlucky but it doesn't bode well for Berghaus reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Iridium

customer_reviews.title: Hope of repeat comfort..
customer_reviews.text: I have been a lover of all things Berghaus for a good number of years. My last pair of GTX boots are good and after a short time fitted like slippers. These walking shoes seem well engineered but are a little on the small size. I haven't had a chance to use them for more than a few times so am hopeful that they will follow past performance. Is there a problem of inconsistencies to ask about size?
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for dog walking and trekking. Much lighter to wear than walking boots. Gortex lining ensures water proof and tough but flexible sole.
customer_reviews.author: C Turner

customer_reviews.title: Hole after 3 months and unable to return them
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes for just over 3 months and they have a hole in the front already but I am now unable to return them. Don't buy as not worth the money as they don't last. Very disappointed with Berghaus as not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM A MCKINNEY

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, not worm them much yet but they are a great fit and feel comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these shoes, they are more expensive than I normally pay but they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Good - so far...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars so far - am bearing in mind other reviewers concerns about the shoes longevity. But very good fit, comfortable and waterproof. Had some North Face gtx shoes a while ago and had to send two pairs back as they were definitely not waterproof. Only bought them as I couldn't find the Berghaus ones in my size anywhere - glad they're available again now.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat

customer_reviews.title: These are very poor quality. They claim to be Gor-Tex
customer_reviews.text: These are very poor quality. They claim to be Gor-Tex, but leak like sieves. If you want something waterproof, don't waste your money here. They don't even offer refunds or returns.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well made. Look great and fit well
customer_reviews.author: strthnt@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these as husband finds them really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: The shoes appear to be of good quality, but the fit is slightly larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes appear to be of good quality, but the fit is slightly larger than I expected and I immediately had doubts as to whether to ask for a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: R J Winser

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I hope these are as good as my last excellent pair
customer_reviews.author: brewers droop

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: To tight and to long made the trainer creek at the front
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel baines

customer_reviews.title: Appauling
customer_reviews.text: Un happy wit my purchase on these boots , have worn them once since bought them an Tha was around the house as there is a fault with them , a squeeking noise in the sole sounds like a mouse in my shoe !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excelent quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a direct replacement for my current Berghaus shoes of the same model. As with all of Berghaus products they are excelent quality all round No breaking in required perfect fit straight out on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Sinclair

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Explorer Active Gore-tex Low Rise Walking Shoes
product_meta.description:
Fully waterproof, high performance hiking shoe.

Tough and durable no matter where your feet take you, these robust super gripped boots will stand up to the test. Even the boggiest terrain is no match, your feet will stay dry and relaxed with totally breathable GORE-TEX Extended Comfort. It even offers climate control, so no matter what’s going on outside, be sure your feet are being cared for inside.

Weight (approximately): 790 g.



MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION


From Helvellyn to the Himalyas, Berghaus has an amazing ability to tap into that feeling of joy and discovery in the outdoors. Even in the driving hail, it’s where we all feel at home. This is the feeling behind Berghaus. From the first shop in the North East of England, Berghaus have come a long way. In 50 years, they’ve used their experience to design, test and develop well thought out kit that’s built to last. Loved worldwide, Berghaus know that the difference between enjoying the outdoors and truly loving it is all down to one simple thing. Ideal Berghaus kit.
